timeline.message: doc(release-notes): Added release note for diagnostics property.
refactor: Fixed formatting of wrapped constructor parameters.

timeline.bodyText: If this is all the method does, why even have this in a method?
timeline.author: taikuukaits

timeline.bodyText: Did you consider having a single method that returned a result object?
timeline.author: taikuukaits

replies.bodyText: I've made DiagnosticsDecider return a DiagnosticsDecision.
replies.author: JakeMathews

timeline.message: refactor(diagnostic): DiagnosticsDecider now produces a DiagnosticsDecision.
test-fix(diagnostic): DiagnosticsDecider now produces a DiagnosticsDecision.
